concept.title: Installing the from ZIP archive [all platforms]

conbody.p: Download the Miramo DITA-OT plugin ZIP file from www.miramo.com into a temporary folder tmpdir, then run the 'dita -install-pNNN.zip' command to install and register the plugin with the DITA-OT, for example:
and runs the DITA-OT integrator to register the new 'mmpdf' transformation type.
See www.dita-ot.org for more information on installing and integrating DITA-OT plugins.
